attributes.description:
All  new Karoo storm models are sold with a 4-year/120 000 km mechanical warranty and 5-year/90 000 km service plan.
The new Mahindra Karoo storm S11 Automatic is a striking grey lifestyle-focused double cab model based on the S11 Karoo and is fitted with the best on offer in the Mahindra parts catalogue and a few very special additions that are not available to other Mahindra Pik Up owners.Starting with the styling ‚Äì the new Karoo storm is an unmissable lifestyle double cab. The model is wrapped in a hard-wearing matt black film that makes it unique from any production Pik Up on the road.Adding to the stand-out design is a special set of 17‚Äù machined off-road alloys in black with silver detailing in the outer rim. The alloys are fitted with special mud terrain tyres from General Tyre that adds an aggressive tread profile and additional visual appeal to this unique bakkie.
